mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.SYSTEM_ID,a.SYSTEM_NAME,a.SYSTEM_URL,a.SYSTEM_ICON FROM system_info a INNER JOIN unit_system_relation b ON b.SYSTEM_ID = a.SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN unit c ON c.UNIT_ID = b.UNIT_ID INNER JOIN unit_user_relation d ON d.UNIT_ID = c.UNIT_ID INNER JOIN `user` e ON e.USER_ID = d.USER_ID AND e.ACCOUNT = #{account} AND e.DEL_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY a.SYSTEM_ORDER ASC LIMIT #{currentIndex},#{pageNum}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.SYSTEM_ID) AS systemCount FROM system_info a INNER JOIN unit_system_relation b ON b.SYSTEM_ID = a.SYSTEM_ID INNER JOIN unit c ON c.UNIT_ID = b.UNIT_ID INNER JOIN unit_user_relation d ON d.UNIT_ID = c.UNIT_ID INNER JOIN `user` e ON e.USER_ID = d.USER_ID AND e.ACCOUNT = #{account} AND e.DEL_FLAG = '0'
